description: This file defines a class 'AppConstants' containing various app-wide constants such as sizes, labels, and messages used throughout a Flutter app for the 2048 game. It centralizes magic numbers and string literals for maintainability.

classes.name: AppConstants
classes.description: A utility class providing static constants for sizes, radii, gaps, and text labels used globally within the app.

methods.name: AppConstants._
methods.description: Private constructor to prevent instantiation; this class is used as a namespace for constants.
